news.title: US woman convicted over failed assassination in UK
news.summary: Aimee Betro flew into the country and tried to shoot a man at point-blank range before going on the run for nearly five years.

news.title: A dating app, a niqab and a 9mm gun - how a US woman was hired to end a UK family feud
news.summary: US woman Aimee Betro was hired to come to the UK to kill a Birmingham man as part of a family feud.

news.title: Ukraine's borders must not be changed by force, EU leaders say
news.summary: The EU says "the people of Ukraine must have the freedom to decide their future".

news.title: Wildfires rage across southern Europe as temperatures top 40C
news.summary: The heatwave has led to red alerts being issued in parts of Italy, France, Spain, Portugal and the Balkans.

news.title: Dozens of luxury cars, including twin Lamborghinis, seized in London
news.summary: Police seize 72 vehicles worth Â£6m in an operation across Hyde Park, Kensington and Chelsea.

news.title: Small boat migrant crossings hit 50,000 under Labour
news.summary: A government minister describes the number as "unacceptable" but says Labour is "making progress".

news.title: Israel bombards Gaza City as UK and allies demand action against 'unfolding famine'
news.summary: The countries demanded "immediate, permanent and concrete steps" to facilitate the entry of aid to Gaza.

news.title: JD Vance continues UK holiday with visit to Jenrick in Cotswolds
news.summary: The US vice-president and Conservative shadow justice secretary meet during Vance's holiday in the UK.

news.title: Starbucks tells customers in South Korea not to bring printers or PCs to cafes
news.summary: Customers have been bringing in printers and multiple computers as they work from cafes.

news.title: YouTuber George Clarke added to Strictly line-up
news.summary: He joins the likes of Balvinder Sopal and Jimmy Floyd Hasselbaink on the BBC dance floor show.
